page.title: 18The Klondyke Club (Royston)
page.content: 1.Does it benefit the community? Ans. Providing Social Recreation. 2.Who runs the club? Ans. The committee. 3.How often does the committee meet? Ans. Every Sunday morning. 4.Can anyone join the club? Ans. Age 18 and passed by committee. 5.What are the opening times? Ans. Mon.to Sat.12 to 4.7pm to 11.30. 6.How many stewards do you have? Ans. 1 with wife to assist. 7.How many bar staff are employed? Ans. (6) (Used at different times). 8.Who cleans the club? Ans. (4 ladies clean each morning). 9.Is there adequate parking space? Ans. Yes,large car park at rear side. 10.How much beer sold in 1 week? Ans. 4,320 pints. 11.What is the cost of 1 pint? Ans. 67p per pint.
